Properties.string: Call in an airstrike on a designated location.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
cooldown=20 jetheight=200 jetdistance=2000 jetspeed=300
debris=game:GetService("Debris") location=Vector3.new(0,0,0) check=true marked=false
talkinggrip=CFrame.new(0.121005774, -1.07626426, 1.151003, -0.571957648, 0.032301072, -0.819646955, 0.0999610648, 0.994521916, -0.0305611696, 0.814169705, -0.0994124785, -0.572053254) holdinggrip=CFrame.new(-0.329237193, -0.576264262, 0.157275885, -0.29237175, 0, -0.956304729, 0.0999610648, 0.994521916, -0.0305611696, 0.951066017, -0.104528464, -0.290770113)
function waitfor(parent,name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
laststrike=waitfor(sp,"LastStrike")
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer sp.Grip=holdinggrip if mouse~=nil and plr~=nil then if tick()-cooldown<laststrike.Value then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(laststrike.Value-(tick()-cooldown)) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if tick()-cooldown>laststrike.Value and mouse.Target and mouse.Target~=nil and mouse.Hit then location=mouse.Hit.p local chr=sp.Parent if chr and check then local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t and h and h.Health>0 then check=false laststrike.Value=tick() mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" sp.Grip=talkinggrip local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("Sound") if sound~=nil then sound:Play() end
local tp=Instance.new("Part") tp.Transparency=.5 tp.Name="Effect" tp.Anchored=true tp.CanCollide=false tp.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) tp.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Lime green") tp.CFrame=CFrame.new(location)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) local me=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") me.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=3270017" me.Scale=Vector3.new(40,40,1) me.Parent=tp debris:AddItem(tp,5) tp.Parent=game.Workspace delay(0,function() while tp and tp.Transparency<1 do tp.Transparency=tp.Transparency+.025 wait(.15) end if tp then tp:remove() end end)
local m=Instance.new("Model") m.Name="F22 Bombing Jet" local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Locked=true p.Name="Torso" p.Transparency=0 p.CanCollide=true p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.formFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(20,5,20) p.CFrame=CFrame.new(location+Vector3.new(0,jetheight,0))*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*math.random(),0)*CFrame.new(0,0,jetdistance) p.Parent=m
local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88775328" mesh.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88775716" mesh.Scale=Vector3.new(10,10,10) mesh.Parent=p
local smoke=Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.RiseVelocity=20 smoke.Parent=p
local he=Instance.new("Part") he.Locked=true he.Name="Head" he.formFactor="Custom" he.Transparency=1 he.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) he.Parent=m
local bf=Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force=Vector3.new(0,(p:GetMass()+he:GetMass())*196.2,0) bf.Parent=p
local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Name="Neck" w.Part0=p w.Part1=he w.Parent=p
local h=Instance.new("Humanoid") h.MaxHealth=5 h.Health=5 h.WalkSpeed=0 h.Sit=true h.Parent=m
local tl=Instance.new("Vector3Value") tl.Name="TargetLocation" tl.Value=location tl.Parent=m
local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Name="creator" ct.Parent=m
local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=m s.Disabled=false
local vel=((location+Vector3.new(0,jetheight,0))-p.Position).unit*jetspeed p.Velocity=vel he.Velocity=vel
debris:AddItem(m,20) m.Parent=game.Workspace
wait(5) local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("Sound") if sound~=nil then sound:Stop() end sp.Grip=holdinggrip wait(cooldown-5) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
jetheight=150
bombs=3 droprange=450
alive=true debris=game:GetService("Debris")
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end
head=waitfor(sp,"Head") hum=waitfor(sp,"Humanoid") torso=waitfor(sp,"Torso") ct=waitfor(sp,"creator") tl=waitfor(sp,"TargetLocation")
torso.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent~=sp and hit.Name~="Effect" then if hum then hum.Health=0 end end end)
delay(0,function() local jsound=Instance.new("Sound") jsound.Name="JetScream" jsound.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88862455" jsound.Volume=.6 debris:AddItem(jsound,10) jsound.Parent=game.Workspace wait(2) jsound:Play() end)
hum.Changed:connect(function(prop) if alive then if hum then if hum.Health<=0 then alive=false if torso then hum:remove() local e=Instance.new("Explosion") e.Position=torso.Position e.BlastPressure=0 e.BlastRadius=15 e.ExplosionType=2 e.Parent=game.Workspace local f=Instance.new("Fire") f.Size=100 f.Heat=100 f.Parent=torso if head then head:remove() end torso.Velocity=torso.Velocity+Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*50,(math.random()-.5)*50,(math.random()-.5)*50) wait(3) if torso then torso.Transparency=1 torso.Velocity=torso.Velocity+Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*50,(math.random()-.5)*50,(math.random()-.5)*50) end wait(3) end sp:remove() end else alive=false sp:remove() end end end)
while alive do if torso and tl then if bombs>0 then if (torso.Position-tl.Value).magnitude<droprange then bombs=bombs-1 local b=Instance.new("Part") b.Name="Effect" b.formFactor="Custom" b.Size=Vector3.new(3,3,10)*.5 b.CanCollide=false b.CFrame=torso.CFrame b.Velocity=torso.Velocity ct:clone().Parent=b local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=b s.Disabled=false local so=Instance.new("Sound") so.SoundId="rbxasset://sounds/collide.wav" so.Volume=1 so.Pitch=.75 so.Parent=b local mesh=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88782666" mesh.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=88782631" mesh.Scale=Vector3.new(6,6,6) mesh.Parent=b debris:AddItem(b,10) b.Parent=game.Workspace end torso.Velocity=((tl.Value+Vector3.new(0,jetheight,0))-torso.Position).unit*torso.Velocity.magnitude else torso.Velocity=torso.Velocity+Vector3.new(0,10,0) end torso.CFrame=CFrame.new(torso.Position,torso.Position+torso.Velocity) end wait(.25) end

--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
blastRadius=19 blastPressure=2*10^6
exploded=false
function damaged(hit) local ct=sp:FindFirstChild("creator") if ct.Value~=nil and (hit.Name=="Head" or hit.Name=="Torso") then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end ct:clone().Parent=h end end end
function explode() if not exploded then exploded=true sp.Anchored=true sp.Transparency=1 local s=sp:FindFirstChild("Sound") if s~=nil then s:Play() end local e=Instance.new("Explosion") e.Position=sp.Position e.BlastPressure=blastPressure e.BlastRadius=blastRadius e.ExplosionType=2 e.Hit:connect(damaged) e.Parent=game.Workspace wait(.5) if sp and sp~=nil and sp.Parent~=nil then sp:remove() end end end
sp.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Name~="Effect" and hit.Parent.Name~="F22 Bombing Jet" then explode() end end end)
